statements: SELECT * FROM investment_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT investment_opportunity, investment_score FROM investment_recommendations WHERE investment_score > 80;
SELECT investment_opportunity FROM investment_recommendations WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM investment_recommendations ORDER BY investment_score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_recommendations FROM investment_recommendations;
SELECT user_id, investment_opportunity, investment_score FROM investment_recommendations WHERE investment_score > 80 ORDER BY investment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM investment_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT investment_opportunity, investment_score FROM investment_recommendations WHERE user_id = 2003 AND investment_score BETWEEN 50 AND 70
SELECT user_id, investment_opportunity FROM investment_recommendations WHERE user_id IN (1001, 1005, 1010) ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT investment_opportunity FROM investment_recommendations
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_type, investment_horizon FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, investment_type, investment_horizon FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT user_id, investment_type FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT data_id, user_id, asset_name, asset_price, timestamp FROM historical_data;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_type FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_type FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_horizon >= 5 ORDER BY investment_horizon DESC;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_type FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' OR investment_type = 'Bonds';
SELECT u.user_id, u.risk_tolerance, h.asset_name, h.asset_price FROM user_preferences u JOIN historical_data h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE h.asset_price > 100 ORDER BY h.asset_price DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, u.risk_tolerance, h.asset_name, h.timestamp FROM user_preferences u JOIN historical_data h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE h.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY h.timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM Users WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, type, amount FROM Investments WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT user_id, location FROM Users WHERE name = 'John' OR name = 'Alice'
SELECT name, risk_tolerance FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Users JOIN UserPreferences ON Users.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, location FROM Users WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM Users JOIN Investments ON Users.user_id = Investments.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name, investment_type FROM investments;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM users JOIN user_investments ON users.user_id = user_investments.user_id JOIN investments ON user_investments.investment_id = investments.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id;

SELECT user_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM users JOIN user_investments ON users.user_id = user_investments.user_id JOIN investments ON user_investments.investment_id = investments.investment_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM user_investments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_investment > 1000;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance FROM UserPreferences WHERE investment_horizon > 5;
SELECT investment_name, investment_sector, investment_return FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_rating >= 4;
SELECT user_id, investment_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM UserInvestments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT historical_date, historical_return FROM HistoricalData WHERE investment_id IN (SELECT investment_id FROM RecommendedInvestments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT investment_name, investment_sector, investment_return FROM InvestmentData WHERE investment_return >= 5.00 ORDER BY investment_return DESC;
SELECT user_id, investment_id, investment_amount FROM UserInvestments WHERE investment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND investment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT investment_id, historical_date, historical_return FROM HistoricalData WHERE historical_date = '2022-06-30' ORDER BY historical_return DESC;

SELECT user_id, investment_name, recommendation_score FROM UserPreferences JOIN RecommendedInvestments ON UserPreferences.user_id = RecommendedInvestments.user_id JOIN InvestmentData ON RecommendedInvestments.investment_id = InvestmentData.investment_id WHERE recommendation_score > 8.0 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
